notes: Appears when [[Rupture]] is damaged a certain amount of hitpoint. It may spawn multiple times.
name: Damage Resonance
behaviour:
It stays at a distance.

Spawns with 4 [[Spark of Destructions]]. When a Damage Resonance spawns, any damage dealt to Rupture will heal Rupture for 5000 hitpoints.
strategy: It is important for all members of the team to not use any utori spells on Rupture. Also recommend all member to stop attack right away when the Damage Resonance spawns. A clear indication of that is when Spark of Destruction spawn.
